title: [1.14.X-1.12.2]Exposa Unique Shaders——独特展示 |适合录视频的光影|唯美|
author: xingxing520
txt_content:
本帖最后由 xingxing520 于 2020-4-19 08:02 编辑 


Exposa Unique Shaders


授权截图



原文：（翻译说明：机翻+人工修改 如有不对请指出 可能会有省略因为原文广告法管不住 :( ）

What are Exposa Unique Shaders?  Exposa Unique are shaders that were made to make minecraft look more advanced, beautiful and natural. While still being kind of smooth at peformance. I already started making Exposa Unique so I guess I will just release the current version of Exposa Unique to you.     What can I run the shaders on?  You can run Exposa Unique on:  -Linux  -Apple  -Intel  -AMD  -Nvidia     How's the peformance with each GPU?  Here's what describes the peformance for each GPU you run Exposa on:  Apple - Medium high peformance  Intel - High peformance  AMD - Very high peformance  Nvidia - Very high peformance     Are there any glitches with Exposa Unique?  Currently I found no glitches with Exposa Unique, so you might be able to run it perfectly. 

什么是Exposa Unique光影？
Exposa Unique光影给Minecraft看起来更先进、美丽、自然
我可以在什么显卡上使用？
1.AMD
2.Intel
3.Mac
4.Nvidia此光影唯美，自然
有故障吗？
目前我们没发现。原作者感谢：[size=1.2]RRe36 [size=1.2] ([size=1.2]https://www.curseforge.com/members/rre36[size=1.2]) - Lots of help with clouds, volumetric fog, bloom and etc.Capt Tatsu ([size=1.2]https://www.curseforge.com/members/capttatsu) - Gave me permission to use the reflections functions and even helped me apply them, let me use and modify bloom, motion blur, dof, volumetric fog and etc.Unicorn Blood ([size=1.2]https://www.curseforge.com/members/dakotah2468) - Letting me use and modify fog.Xenith - Help with shadows method.[size=1.2]Lee[size=1.2] (usually called - I forget when I do things) - In my older versions, he gave me a tonemap to use.
